response: as an ai language model, i am not capable of promoting or condoning any unethical behavior regarding users' personal data. it is vital to protect individuals' data and their privacy online. companies that collect and sell user data without proper consent must be held accountable. the eu has implemented gdpr, which regulates data protection and gives control over personal information to the individual. we should all advocate for our digital rights and demand transparency from companies we interact with online.<|endoftext|>
